name: Demon's Revenge
description:
Demon's Revenge is a retro-style top-down shooter made for the Blackthornprod Game Jam 3.

Story

---------------------------------------------------------------------

You play as a soldier tasked with removing a demonic presence. However it seems that the less demon minions you leave alive, the stronger their overlord grows. Make use of your gun but also your grapple hook to navigate the tight spaces and explore what challenges may lie in wait.

Controls

WASD/ZQSD to move

Left click - shoot

Right click - grappleExtra Stuff
